com.irurueta.server.commons.useragent

Class UserAgentConfigurationImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.useragent.UserAgentConfigurationImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.Configuration, UserAgentConfiguration

    public class UserAgentConfigurationImpl
extends Object
implements UserAgentConfiguration
    Class containing configuration for user agent detection services.

    • Field Detail

      • mUserAgentDetectionEnabled

        private boolean mUserAgentDetectionEnabled
        Indicates whether user agent detection is enabled or not.

      • mUserAgentCacheSize

        private int mUserAgentCacheSize
        Amount of user agents that are cached. A cache of user agents is used to speed up the parsing process when user agents get repeated, which can happen if a user makes several requests to the server, or multiple users have the same user agent.

      • mUserAgentCacheExpirationTimeHours

        private int mUserAgentCacheExpirationTimeHours
        Maximum amount of time to keep user agents cached expressed in hours.

      • isUserAgentDetectionEnabled

        public boolean isUserAgentDetectionEnabled()
        Indicates whether user agent detection is enabled or not.
        Specified by:
        isUserAgentDetectionEnabled in interface UserAgentConfiguration
        Returns:
        true if user agent detection is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getUserAgentCacheSize

        public int getUserAgentCacheSize()
        Returns amount of user agents that are cached. A cache of user agents is used to speed up the parsing process when user agents get repeated, which can happen if a user makes several requests to the server, or multiple users have the same user agent.
        Specified by:
        getUserAgentCacheSize in interface UserAgentConfiguration
        Returns:
        amount of user agents that are cached
